title: "Walking Outside: 3 Practices That Enhance Your Wellbeing"
excerpt: "All three enhance your life. They are supported by research showing, in brief, that any amount of time spent outdoors increases wellbeing, calm, and a sense of connection with something larger than your own conflicts and concerns."
